message.body: Hey Greg, my other potential buyer was a no show. So the car is yours for $4,500
Awesome. I can write you a check today if you'd like.
Let me find out if we need an appointment at the auto tags office. Can you pay me in a cashiers check instead of a personal check? And you can pay me whenever we meet to sign it over
Sure no problem. I'll get a cashiers check Monday.
When you get a chance can you send me the VIN so I can update my insurance? No rush.
